episodes.title: A Christmas Carol
episodes.plot: Festive edition of the time-travelling drama. The Doctor has one hour to save a crashing spaceship and a miser's soul - but what lurks in the fog?

episodes.title: The Impossible Astronaut
episodes.plot: The Doctor, Amy, Rory and River Song are reunited in the Utah desert.

episodes.title: Day of the Moon
episodes.plot: The Doctor and his allies mount a rebellion against invaders who have been controlling humanity from the very beginning.

episodes.title: The Curse of the Black Spot
episodes.plot: The Doctor, Amy and Rory find themselves aboard a marooned pirate ship whose crew is being picked off one by one by a beautiful - and deadly - Siren.

episodes.title: The Doctor's Wife
episodes.plot: The Doctor is lured to a sentient asteroid outside of the Universe by a Time Lord distress signal and soon realises his TARDIS is in grave danger.

episodes.title: The Rebel Flesh
episodes.plot: A solar tsunami sends the TARDIS crew to an acid mining factory in the 22nd century, where a small team of workers come under attack from their doppelgangers.

episodes.title: The Almost People
episodes.plot: The gangers and humans battle for their lives as the factory crumbles and the Doctor tries to keep the peace - can everyone make it off the island alive?

episodes.title: A Good Man Goes to War
episodes.plot: A member of The Doctor's team has been abducted and he will call in every favor and maybe even go to war to get them back.

episodes.title: Let's Kill Hitler
episodes.plot: The search for Melody Pond brings the Doctor and his friends to Berlin in 1938, face-to-face with Adolf Hitler, River Song and a justice-serving, shapeshifting robot.

episodes.title: Night Terrors
episodes.plot: Receiving a powerful distress call from a terrified little boy, the Doctor and his friends soon find that the monsters in his cupboard are real - and deadly.

episodes.title: The Girl Who Waited
episodes.plot: Amy is trapped in a quarantine facility where time moves faster than in reality, while the Doctor is confined to the TARDIS. Can Rory save his wife in time?

episodes.title: The God Complex
episodes.plot: The Doctor, Amy and Rory become trapped in a hotel of horrors unable to escape and unable to find the TARDIS. The Doctor must save as many people as he can taking many twists and seeing his own worst fear.

episodes.title: Closing Time
episodes.plot: The Doctor makes one last stop before his death to see an old friend. But people are disappearing, there are reports of a silver rat and metal men are lurking in the shadows.

episodes.title: The Wedding of River Song
episodes.plot: April 22nd, 2011; 5:02pm. Having finally accepted his fate the Doctor travels to Lake Silencio for his final day. But one woman refuses to let time take its course.
